mapper.select: SELECT I.INCENTIVE_ID AS incentiveId,I.USER_ID AS userId,I.INCENTIVE_TYPE AS incentiveType,I.INCENTIVE_ITEM AS incentiveItem, I.INCENTIVE_TIME AS incentiveTime, I.INCENTIVE_AMOUNT AS incentiveAmount,I.SALARY_MONTH AS salaryMonth FROM HR_INCENTIVE I WHERE I.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND I.USER_ID=(SELECT U.USER_ID FROM HR_USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=#{accountId})
